alert.note: Alert for Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 18 at 4:25AM MST until January 18 at 6:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet County. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected on Wednesday afternoon across the highest terrain of the Sacramento Mountains and adjacent east slopes. Some isolated locations may have gusts approaching 60 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
